mapper.select: select qna.id, qna.goodsId, qna.parentId, qna.type, qna.title, qna.memberId, qna.createdAt from tb_dzspring_qna as qna inner join ( select id from tb_dzspring_qna where goodsId = #{goodsId} and id = parentId order by id desc limit #{offset}, 5 ) as tmp on qna.id = tmp.id order by qna.id desc
select * from tb_dzspring_qna where parentId= #{parentId} and id != #{parentId}
select count(*) from tb_dzspring_qna where goodsId = #{goodsId}
